EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Honeywell Pilot Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Honeywell Pilot Webinar: TCAS You're invited to participate in the Honeywell Pilot Webinar on collision avoidance and the Traffic Collision Avoidance System (TCAS).
For more information contact us at: FTS@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/kQ0mq0Z00xK02IGYX20p70X>
{{my.My Token:default=Click here}} <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell Vision Systems.ics> to download the Outlook invitation complete with dial-in/login details.
This conference is scheduled for: 9:00 AM (Pacific Time) Monday, May 4th for a duration of 60 minutes (12:00 PM Eastern, 11:00 AM Central, 10:00 AM Mountain)
